ing: 1 (46 fluid ounce) bottle tomato-vegetable juice cocktail
des: "My sister got this recipe from a restaurant in Ohio and all our family loves it. This is very spicy and needs time to blend flavors."
ins: In a large pitcher, combine juice cocktail, lemon juice and brown sugar. Season with Worcestershire sauce, horseradish, hot sauce and celery salt. Cover, and refrigerate 8 to 12 hours to allow flavors to meld.
